combat_intensity.description: This state will be triggered if Combat intensity is higher than this value

enemy_proximity.description: This state will be triggered if enemy is in less than this value meters from you

alert_level.description: This state will be triggered if there is an enemy with aler level higher than this value

since_last_shot.description: This state will be triggered if avatar made a shot within time value

injury_type.description: This state will be triggered if avatar has this injury

damage_over_time.description: This state will be triggered if damage is higher

health_percentage.description: This state will be triggered if health is lower
